title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 732-2.4 - Reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 732-2.4 - Reimbursement

State Regulations
(a) A PPO shall not
be required to reimburse for provider services in accordance with the provider
fee schedules authorized pursuant to the Workers' Compensation Law. (b) PPOs shall be eligible for reimbursement
on a fee-for-service basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
732-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
